title: The Garden of roses
brief_description: At Geelong Hospital there is a garden of peace, opened in 2001, to commemorate all medical staff who have served their country in war and peace. This is Ted’s story (a Korean veteran) of his involvement and pride in being associated with this special garden of reflection and remembrance.
